item.title: 2018 DerbyCon Hiring List
item.author: Rob Fuller
item.description: Created the 2018 UNOFFICIAL DerbyCon Hiring List. To get on the list is even easier now! Just complete the following form: https://goo.gl/forms/K6kfOY5dHH6lcQm63 (One small tip, first come first serve, so if you want to be on the top of the list it’s best to submit the best info you have vs waiting on anyone, I don’t change the list order for anyone.) Direct Link to the Hiring List Google Doc: https://docs.
